creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of a crowd of people in front of a cathedral; those in foreground are facing the viewer
image_copyright: James Ensor%2C The Cathedral 1886. © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29 New York %2F SABAM%2C Brussels
inscription:
Signature, Date, Label

-- label on back of frame: John A. Torson 340 East 63rd Street, New York, New York / artist: James Ensor / medium: etching / title: La Cathedrale / date: 1886 / Croquez #7 bis; stock #2751
-- in red pencil on back of frame: 2034 J. Torson
-- in graphite on verso of sheet, at bottom: [La Cathedrale]
provenance: [John A. Torson, New York; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in graphite, lower right: [James Ensor]; signed in plate, upper right: [Ensor 1886]; signed on plumed hat within image, bottom center: [Ensor]
title: The Cathedral
